title: An Olive Grove in Laharum
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Harvesting machinery - Australia

abstract: See why Laharum is the perfect place to grow olives and how its peaceful exterior belies a thriving business. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Horsham Shire'.
description: Toscana Olive Plantation and Laharum Grove, in western Victoria, both operate from the same original plantation of olives, working together to ensure the freshness, quality and flavour of their oil. While they acknowledge Laharum is a peaceful place to live, the workers at these olive farms are hectic, determined to produce some of the best quality olive oil in Victoria.
